column4: hello , i installed apache2 server + phpmyadmin, but when i go to http://localhost/phpmyadmin i get windows with option to save page ?
hello , i installed apache2 server + phpmyadmin, but when i go to http://localhost/phpmyadmin i get window with option to save page ?
